description: Director Maria Beatty takes fetish film to the next level with this film featuring the talents of Midori and Mayan. Midori brings her expertise of dominance and submission to the screen. Mayan is left exposed and immobilized and with no choice but to submit to her own desires through hot candle wax cocooning, and many other erotic techniques. This breakthrough film will leave any bondage enthusiast thoroughly captivated.
title: Silken Sleeves
